channel.name: Eden_to_NCHS_v26

properties.select: SELECT edenmaster.StateFileNumber AS hl7_export_StateFileNumber, edenmaster.MRN AS hl7_export_MRN, edenmaster.DeceasedLast AS hl7_export_DeceasedLast, edenmaster.DeceasedFirst AS hl7_export_DeceasedFirst, edenmaster.DeceasedMiddle AS hl7_export_DeceasedMiddle, edenmaster.DeceasedSuffix AS hl7_export_DeceasedSuffix, edenmaster.SSN AS hl7_export_SSN, edenmaster.Gender AS hl7_export_Gender, edenmaster.BirthCity AS hl7_export_BirthCity, edenmaster.BirthCounty AS hl7_export_BirthCounty, edenmaster.BirthState AS hl7_export_BirthState, edenmaster.BirthCountry AS hl7_export_BirthCountry, edenmaster.BirthCCYY AS hl7_export_BirthCCYY, edenmaster.BirthMM AS hl7_export_BirthMM, edenmaster.BirthDD AS hl7_export_BirthDD, edenmaster.RaceWhite AS hl7_export_RaceWhite, edenmaster.RaceBlack AS hl7_export_RaceBlack, edenmaster.RaceAmIndian AS hl7_export_RaceAmIndian, edenmaster.RaceTribeSpec AS hl7_export_RaceTribeSpec, edenmaster.RaceChinese AS hl7_export_RaceChinese, edenmaster.RaceJapanese AS hl7_export_RaceJapanese, edenmaster.RaceHawaiian AS hl7_export_RaceHawaiian, edenmaster.RaceFilipino AS hl7_export_RaceFilipino, edenmaster.RaceOtherAsian AS hl7_export_RaceOtherAsian, edenmaster.RaceAsianSpec AS hl7_export_RaceAsianSpec, edenmaster.RaceAsianIndian AS hl7_export_RaceAsianIndian, edenmaster.RaceKorean AS hl7_export_RaceKorean, edenmaster.RaceSamoan AS hl7_export_RaceSamoan, edenmaster.RaceVietnamese AS hl7_export_RaceVietnamese, edenmaster.RaceGuamanian AS hl7_export_RaceGuamanian, edenmaster.RacePacIslander AS hl7_export_RacePacIslander, edenmaster.RaceOther AS hl7_export_RaceOther, edenmaster.RaceUnknown AS hl7_export_RaceUnknown, edenmaster.Education AS hl7_export_Education, edenmaster.Occupation AS hl7_export_Occupation, edenmaster.Industry AS hl7_export_Industry, edenmaster.ArmedForces AS hl7_export_ArmedForces, edenmaster.Pregnant AS hl7_export_Pregnant, edenmaster.ResStreetAddress1 AS hl7_export_ResStreetAddress1, edenmaster.ResStreetAddress2 AS hl7_export_ResStreetAddress2, edenmaster.ResCity AS hl7_export_ResCity, edenmaster.ResCounty AS hl7_export_ResCounty, edenmaster.ResState AS hl7_export_ResState, edenmaster.ResCountry AS hl7_export_ResCountry, edenmaster.ResZip5 AS hl7_export_ResZip5, edenmaster.ResInCityLimits AS hl7_export_ResInCityLimits, edenmaster.DeathCCYY AS hl7_export_DeathCCYY, edenmaster.DeathMM AS hl7_export_DeathMM, edenmaster.DeathDD AS hl7_export_DeathDD, edenmaster.FoundDate AS hl7_export_FoundDate, edenmaster.TimeOfDeathHH AS hl7_export_TimeOfDeathHH, edenmaster.TimeOfDeathMM AS hl7_export_TimeOfDeathMM, edenmaster.FoundTime AS hl7_export_FoundTime, edenmaster.PlaceOfDeath AS hl7_export_PlaceOfDeath, edenmaster.FacilityName AS hl7_export_FacilityName, edenmaster.NursingHomeName AS hl7_export_NursingHomeName, edenmaster.POD_OtherSpec AS hl7_export_POD_OtherSpec, edenmaster.NonFacilityLocation AS hl7_export_NonFacilityLocation, edenmaster.CountyOfDeath AS hl7_export_CountyOfDeath, edenmaster.CityOfDeath AS edenmaster_CityOfDeath, edenmaster.CertifierFullName AS hl7_export_CertifierFullName, edenmaster.CertifierSignCCYY AS hl7_export_CertifierSignCCYY, edenmaster.CertifierSignMM AS hl7_export_CertifierSignMM, edenmaster.CertifierSignDD AS hl7_export_CertifierSignDD, edenmaster.CertifierAddress1 AS hl7_export_CertifierAddress1, edenmaster.CertifierAddress2 AS hl7_export_CertifierAddress2, edenmaster.CertifierCity AS hl7_export_CertifierCity, edenmaster.CertifierState AS hl7_export_CertifierState, edenmaster.CertifierCountry AS hl7_export_CertifierCountry, edenmaster.CertifierZip5 AS hl7_export_CertifierZip5, edenmaster.ME_Contacted AS hl7_export_ME_Contacted, edenmaster.AutopsyDone AS hl7_export_AutopsyDone, edenmaster.AutopsyAvailable AS hl7_export_AutopsyAvailable, edenmaster.LastSeenCCYY AS hl7_export_LastSeenCCYY, edenmaster.LastSeenMM AS hl7_export_LastSeenMM, edenmaster.LastSeenDD AS hl7_export_LastSeenDD, edenmaster.DaysLastSeenToDeath AS hl7_export_DaysLastSeenToDeath, edenmaster.ImmediateCause AS hl7_export_ImmediateCause, edenmaster.ImmediateInterval AS hl7_export_ImmediateInterval, edenmaster.ImmediateIntervalUnit AS ImmediateIntervalUnit, edenmaster.AdditionalCause1 AS hl7_export_AdditionalCause1, edenmaster.AdditionalInterval1 AS hl7_export_AdditionalInterval1, edenmaster.AdditionalIntervalUnit1 AS AdditionalIntervalUnit1, edenmaster.AdditionalCause2 AS hl7_export_AdditionalCause2, edenmaster.AdditionalInterval2 AS hl7_export_AdditionalInterval2, edenmaster.AdditionalIntervalUnit2 AS AdditionalIntervalUnit2, edenmaster.UnderlyingCause AS hl7_export_UnderlyingCause, edenmaster.UnderlyingInterval AS hl7_export_UnderlyingInterval, edenmaster.UnderlyingIntervalUnit AS UnderlyingIntervalUnit, edenmaster.OtherConditions AS hl7_export_OtherConditions, edenmaster.MannerOfDeath AS hl7_export_MannerOfDeath, edenmaster.Tobacco AS hl7_export_Tobacco, edenmaster.Injury AS hl7_export_Injury, edenmaster.InjuryCCYY AS hl7_export_InjuryCCYY, edenmaster.InjuryMM AS hl7_export_InjuryMM, edenmaster.InjuryDD AS hl7_export_InjuryDD, edenmaster.InjuryTimeHH AS hl7_export_InjuryTimeHH, edenmaster.InjuryTimeMM AS hl7_export_InjuryTimeMM, edenmaster.InjuryStreet AS hl7_export_InjuryStreet, edenmaster.InjuryCity AS hl7_export_InjuryCity, edenmaster.InjuryCounty AS hl7_export_InjuryCounty, edenmaster.InjuryState AS hl7_export_InjuryState, edenmaster.InjuryCountry AS hl7_export_InjuryCountry, edenmaster.InjuryPlace AS hl7_export_InjuryPlace, edenmaster.InjuryAtWork AS hl7_export_InjuryAtWork, edenmaster.InjuryMotorVehicle AS hl7_export_InjuryMotorVehicle, edenmaster.InjuryMotorSpec AS hl7_export_InjuryMotorSpec, edenmaster.InjuryDescription1 AS hl7_export_InjuryDescription1, edenmaster.InjuryDescription2 AS hl7_export_InjuryDescription2, edenmaster.MasterStatus AS hl7_export_MasterStatus, edenmaster.DropPaperDate AS hl7_export_DropPaperDate, edenmaster.RegisteredCCYY AS hl7_export_registeredccyy, edenmaster.RegisteredMM AS hl7_export_registeredmm, edenmaster.RegisteredDD AS hl7_export_RegisteredDD, edenmaster.MaritalStatus AS hl7_export_MaritalStatus, edenmaster.HispanicOrigin AS hl7_export_hispanicOrigin, edenmaster.AgeInYears AS hl7_export_AgeInYears, edenmaster.AgeInMonths AS hl7_export_AgeInMonths, edenmaster.AgeInDays AS hl7_export_AgeInDays, edenmaster.AgeInHours AS hl7_export_AgeInHours, edenmaster.AgeInMinutes as hl7_export_AgeInMinutes, edenmaster.BirthStateFileNumber AS hl7_export_BirthStateFileNumber, edenmaster.FatherLast AS hl7_export_FatherLast, edenmaster.DispositionBurial as hl7_export_DispositionBurial, edenmaster.DispositionCremation as hl7_export_dispositioncremation, edenmaster.DispositionEntombment as hl7_export_dispositionentombment, edenmaster.DispositionRemoval as hl7_export_dispositionremoval, edenmaster.DispositionOther as hl7_export_dispositionother, edenmaster.ME_CaseNumber as hl7_export_MEcasenumber, edenmaster.ResCityFips as hl7_export_ResCityFips, edenmaster.ResCountyFips as hl7_export_ResCountyFips, edenmaster.ResStateFips as hl7_export_ResStateFips, edenmaster.ResCountryFips as hl7_export_ResCountryFips, edenmaster.BirthStateFips as hl7_export_BirthStateFips, edenmaster.BirthCountryFips as hl7_export_birthcountryfips FROM edenmaster WHERE hl7Send = 0 Limit 1
properties.update: update edenmaster set hl7Send = 1 where StateFileNumber = ${hl7_export_statefilenumber}
